eh_cutscene_free.notes:
- Passenger models are now fixed/preselected; changing passenger ped models is no longer supported.
- Passenger clothing remains configurable.
- Clothing now applies reliably during cutscenes for the passenger.

eh_cutscene_paid.notes:
- Passenger models are now fixed/preselected; changing passenger ped models is no longer supported.
- Passenger clothing remains configurable.
- Clothing now applies reliably during cutscenes for the passenger.

eh_antirelease_shield.notes: Optimized to support low-end PCs—users with slower computers should no longer experience timeouts when joining the server.

raycrest_restaurant_job.notes: Advanced restaurant job script with integrated food delivery system — free upgrade coming soon for current users. Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Eux7CJEQN2
